text: Joseph Banks Rhine (September 29, 1895 â€“ February 20, 1980); usually known as J. B. Rhine) was a pioneer of parapsychology. Rhine founded the parapsychology lab at Duke University, the Journal of Parapsychology, and the Foundation for Research on the Nature of Man. He also initiated the Parapsychological Association. title: Joseph Banks Rhine
